notes.title: Supporting Information Available
notes.p:
The Supporting Information is available free of charge on the ACS Publications website at DOI: 10.1021/acs.jpclett.9b00220.
Details of the electron density refinement and of the flood-fill-type algorithm, all merging points of covalent [ f] domains, volume and integral of the electron density within covalent and noncovalent DORI [ f] domains, and additional 2D and 3D DORI representations ( PDF)
